ALERT: Yay!
CONFIRM: Question?
PROMPT: Question?, default text: 
This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS alert() returns synchronously in a sandboxed page without blocking on user input. 
PASS print() returns synchronously in a sandboxed page without blocking on user input. 
PASS confirm() returns 'true' in a sandboxed page (in our test environment). 
PASS prompt() returns 'null' synchronously in a sandboxed page without blocking on user input. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
